title: Week 4 NFL Recap: Buffalo steals a win on the road, Eagles stay undefeated, and Patrick Mahomes put on a show on Sunday Night Football (Football 10/3)
description:
Will Brinson, Ryan Wilson, and John Breech recap an interesting Week 4 in the NFL. The Buffalo Bills steals a win on the road, the Philadelphia Eagles stay undefeated, and Patrick Mahomes put on a show on Sunday Night Football.

Chiefs-Bucs 3:05
Bills-Ravens 17:00
Vikings-Saints 25:30
Commanders-Cowboys 34:35
Seahawks-Lions 42:00
Jaguars-Eagles 46:44
Jets-Steelers 54:40
Patriots-Packers 1:03:47
Broncos-Raiders  1:10:40
Chargers-Texans    1:16:50
Browns-Falcons   1:21:10
Bears-Giants      1:24:24
Cardinals-Panthers  1:28:50
Titans-Colts       1:32:56
